name: insect-plate
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Bug moves by 20%. Held by a Multitype Pokémon: Holder’s type becomes Bug.
short_effect: Held: Bug-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus’s and Judgment’s type to Bug.

flavor_text.sword_shield: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a stone tablet that boosts the power of Bug-type moves.
